properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL= ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N' AND SOCIAL_FL = 'N'
UPDATE CERTIFICATION SET C_NUMBER =?, ISSUE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL=?

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT '1' FROM certification WHERE email = ? AND c_number = ?)=1 THEN nvl( (SELECT '1' FROM CERTIFICATION WHERE email = ? AND issue_dt + (INTERVAL '5' MINUTE) >= SYSDATE),'2') ELSE '3' END FROM DUAL
